title: LF More Players for  5s Team Silver/Gold at least
body: Starting a team we have top/mid and jungle/support covered. The two of us have a few roles we can play and we are both gold. We do not want a serious team, we want to play ranked and have fun, cant take yourself too seriously. Prefer playing with 18+, want mature players. Please post or pm me in game for more information. We want to do well but have fun at the same time. Looking for ADC mainly, and otherwise we can fill roles.

replies.body: I will try to reach out to you guys in game. We play a few games a night but I get more time on the weekends, I have a full time job so hopefully can play some games this weekend. I will be in touch.
I main mid : WaE CLoud i wont dissapoint

I'm a G5 and I mainly play Support (But do play Mid/Top on occasion). I'm looking to get Ranked wins so that I can get the ward skin at the end of the season, so feel free to add me if you need a fill.
ADC main, would love a fun ranked team that still tries to win. add me in game if you'd like more info. also hopefully are available times work out.

IGN: guykaj
Rank: Silver 4(hopefully 3 tomorrow)
Lane: Bot lane main, can fill to any lane though
Champion Pool (At least 3): adc; {{champion:42}} <-best {{champion:222}}  {{champion:18}}  {{champion:15}} 
 Sup: {{champion:267}} <-best {{champion:89}}  {{champion:412}} {{champion:53}} 
Strengths/Weaknesses: Getting overconfident when I am doing well, causes me to die more than needed. Have been keeping my head together more so lately, starting to affect less games. My strength would be my ability to adapt to whats going on around me and noticing the smaller things.
Write Your Thoughts: I'd be happy to join, but I prefer to be on a team with at least one girl. They tend to keep the group focused and keep their head better than guys.
